item.name: Southern Highland Wines
item.description: Southern Highland Wines is owned by Eddy Rossi (general manager, winemaker and export director), Frank Colloridi (production director) and Darren Corradi (viticulture and sales director). Both Darren and Eddy have had lengthy careers in various Griffith wineries. The venture has increased significantly since its foundation, the vineyard area doubling and production climbing to its present level, with wines coming from other regions, notably the Altitude 676 range. Exports to China and NZ.
